name: Cabot Court Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Thursday lunchtime, we are in Weston Super Mud, two grandsons (10 & 11) are hungry.
reviews.title: Wetherspoons - How do they do it ?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We go into the Restaurant of the Cabot Court Hotel, this is a Wetherspoons house. Well set out, clean and airy, quite busy. It was Valentines day. The wife and myself ordered the Valentine deal, two meals and sweets and a bottle of Hardys Shiraz for £20. Her meal was a sirloin steak, well cooked and tender. Mine was a (superior)Curry which contained a whole chicken breast served with poppadums and a naan. Sweet was a sundae (donated to grandsons) and chocolate fudge cake. Wine smashing. The boys had the Gammon Steak, egg and chips . It was served on a huge page and filled it .
reviews.title: Great value for money and fantastic sea view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At the end there were 4 empty plates and an empty wine bottle. A very enjoyable experience.
reviews.title: Loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were superb, helpful, frie ndly and attentive. The bill £33.....How do they do it...well done
reviews.title: nice time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had never stayed in a Wetherspoon's hotel before, but we were pleasantly surprised. We stayed for 2 nights and paid a bit extra for a sea-view room (although this was still really good value for money). You pay for room only, but then the bar serves breakfast in the morning and you get a discount voucher for meals - breakfast was about £3.50 each, which was a bargain!
reviews.title: Visit 3rd-6th Feb 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived by rail -15 mins. walk to hotel pleasant reception,small lift if you have large luggage or more than 2 people.We had room 201 with a side view of promenade and the sea.The room was very good,clean,king size bed,good selection of tv channels,toilet paper a bit "rough" .Bus stops outside,promenade,pier,sea outside great location!20% off breakfast for guests Would stay again!
reviews.title: 2 nights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: my wife and I stayed for three nights over a weekend and was blew away with the great service friendly staff and amazing room . we have stayed in some of the best 4 star hotels in the uk and the rooms here are as good if not better than some of the bigger chains .The hotel was great the bars were modern and very clean and very friendly couldn't fault anything thanks to all the staff for a pleasant break will be back soon .
reviews.title: A great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We saw in a Wetherspoon magazine whilst staying at another Wetherspoon hotel that the Cabot Court was rated its No1 hotel, also rated No1 in Weston Super Mare by Tripadvisor. The ratings are quite true, this is a very comfortable hotel with good food at very reasonable prices. We had room 209 which overlooked the promenade in 2 directions, an excellent room. Everything about the room was good, and the bed was very comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Seaside Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: It is clear that the hotel has been recently renovated but kept a lot of it's old character, well done Wetherspoons.
reviews.title: Way too noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel due to the great reviews on Tripadvisor, but our experience was not great.
reviews.title: well done wetherspoons

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Didn't actually know that Wetherspoons 'did' hotels!
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were a bit apprehensive about what to expect but we were so pleasantly surprised and would highly recommend Cabot Court Hotel!
reviews.title: Excellent value for money - no car park.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were looking for a last minute room when our day trip turned into an overnight stay!
reviews.title: fantastic location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wow! Our room was beautifully decorated and furnished. It was also spacious with a fab view of the beach and pier. The Bedroom and en suite bathroom were both spotlessly clean and well equipped.
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You also receive 20% off any food you might buy in the Wetherspoons pub/restaurant. We took advantage of this with a tasty cooked breakfast!
reviews.title: weston super mare break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We ate here last week and were very pleased with the service and the food. the place is huge with 2 floors. food was served promptly and was hot. We had a free drink as is the norm. The service was very pleasant and friendly. Unusual for a wetherspoon.
reviews.title: One of the better wetherspoons

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The Cabot is a nice place to go for a good choice of Ales and beers, they usually have offers on, the food is good, decent size portions and again reasonably priced. It has lots of different levels and seating areas which is good, it can get very busy though so avoid peak times and football games :)
reviews.title: Good value beer and food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: popped in for late luch yesterday and took the advantage of the afternoon offer - fish and chips with a drink for £6.09 great offer, really good service and nice atmosphere. lots of food on the plate whi ch was really well cooked and tasted great. All in all great value
reviews.title: food at the cabot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013
reviews.text: Stayed here many times, lovely service and rooms. Only moan I had last stay was the awlful 'towel floor mats' which resulted in my partner slipping on and spending the afternoon in A&E. these should be replaced with something more suitable as ot was a lucky escape.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a lovely location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is the only downside though, the rest of our stay and the previous trips were wonderful. You get a discount breakfast voucher, handy although the food is cheap enough, lovely touch all the same.
reviews.title: great little hotel

description: Cabot Court Hotel is a newly refurbished GRADE 2 LISTED building. All of our 21 rooms are en-suite and offer tea & coffee making facilities, a hair dryer, and a telephone to receive incoming calls. All of our rooms also house state-of-the-art LCD televisions with most of the rooms enjoying fantastic sea views. We have a great sun deck where you can take in the views of Weston's award-winning beaches and a great views of Steepholm and Cardiff. This is the perfect location for a Great British getaway; enjoy long walks on the beach and everything that Weston-super-Mare has to offer including the world-famous Grand Pier. The hotel is situated behind and above our Wetherspoon & Lloyds No.1 bar, which has music playing Friday and Saturday nights till 2am; Entry is free. Please note some residents may experience some noise from the Lloyds No.1 Bar. We are all here to help you in any way we can to make your stay better; if you have any questions please don't hesitate to ask any member of our team. Look forward to seeing you here.
